Strict time schedules? Um...I believe those time schedules can be adjusted and make allowance for ships to not hit and kill a whale or two or a hundred. Maybe hire whale spotters during the migration months, or all year round, to spot and track whales and communicate with the incoming and outgoing ships the long and lat coordinates of the whales. Just an out there what if thought. The lack of decency and common sense of some individuals is appalling. Adjusting time schedules...Not rocket science. All creatures great and small have the right to life. Holy Moby Dick Batman!

i see nothing racist in those posts. one said """"losers"""" another said """"thugs"""" and """"get a job"""" and the other one had a meme that was the truth- cops have to protect themselves better now, because the risk of getting killed is higher   .  i'm not sure what's racist about that. no specific race was pointed out.    the protesters did commit a form of economic terrorism. businesses lost money because of these people.     the fact remains that breaking the law while protesting the law is counter-productive and does not help your cause.  more respect would have been given had the protest been held outside where a place was set up for it.
